item.title: On It's Alright, Ma (I'm Only Bleeding)
item.description: I’m a big fan of Bob Dylan, though I wouldn’t be brave enough to say I know all his songs or even most of them. He’s written more songs than I’ve had hot meals (a faint memory of my father reading from a magazine on a camping trip). Still, I’ll contend his epic “It’s Alright Ma (I’m Only Bleeding)” is far and away his best work (((if you’re measuring on a usual poetic

item.title: Limerick 1
item.description: It was lovely as love could be Only alone, you with me 'Til one day I saw Into life's gaping maw And ran away across the sea

item.title: In the Beginning*
item.description: *Well not really the beginning This is a post overdue, to a blog I should have started a while ago, if not to achieve anything other than a “I could so I did” thing. After multiple failed attempts using blogger, wordpress, et al. I stopped because I didn’t really like the workflow. 1 So I’m not one to bear the burden of a over-heavy work-flow, if it should take much work to spew my words into the void I likely
